DOC.criteria: Performance status Karnofsky index ≥ 60 % . Early stage well advanced/metastatic ovarian cancer prove abdominal ultrasonography , chest xray , Computerized axial tomography scan . Histologically : epithelial/germ cell Haematology : absolute neutrophil count : ≥2X10^9/L ; Platelet : ≥150X10^9/L ; Haemoglobin : ≥ 10g/dL Liver function : total bilirubin : ≤1X UNL ( upper normal limit ) ; Aspartate transaminase & Alanine aminotransferase : ≤2.5 x UNL ; Alkaline phosphatase : ≤2.5 UNL Renal function : Creatinine : ≤130 µmol/L ; If creatinine > 130 µmol/L , 24 hour creatinine clearance > 60 ml/min . Symptomatic peripheral neuropathy > grade 1 National Cancer Institute Common Toxicity Criteria scale Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus uncontrolled hypertension Pregnant , lactate patient ( patient childbearing potential must use adequate contraception ) . Active infection serious underlie medical condition compatible program entry eg . congestive heart failure , previous myocardial infarction within 6 month prior treatment .
